definitions: An abbreviation for Bovine Serum Albumin, a protein derived from cows, often used in molecular biology applications.
An abbreviation for Boy Scouts of America, a youth organization in the United States.
An abbreviation for Birmingham Small Arms Company, a historic British industrial conglomerate, known for manufacturing firearms, bicycles, and motorcycles.
examples: Add 10% BSA to the blocking buffer.
My son joined the BSA last year.
He restored an old BSA motorcycle.
